attributes.additional_details:
Introduce a free membership card through which holders are permitted to purchase tobacco and alcohol products. Each persons purchase is recorded in a scheme database. Purchase of such products is only permitted to a holder of a membership card.

The cost of any NHS funded treatment for a condition linked to consumption of alcohol or tobacco is, by reference to the patients purchase history levied* against the manufacturer of the products consumed by the card holder.

* via charge or comparable additional tax reflecting ‘additional’ cost to NHS.
